text: idiga allahanu nim'ma honeyannu haguragolisuttane â€“ nim'malli daurbalyaviruvudannu avanu ballanu. Nim'malli nuru jana sahanasilariddare, avaru innuru mandiyannu solisuvaru mattu nim'malli savira janariddare avaru allahana sam'matiyinda eradu savira mandiyannu solisuvaru. Allahanu sahana silara jotegiddane
